item.title: method this.mapView.setMapFile("/sdcard/berlin.map") always return false
item.description:
From dientran...@gmail.com on February 20, 2012 13:04:45
I run AVM r1826 project. After select file , I receive message: unsupport file version: 2 So that, I try to use method this.mapView.setMapFile("/sdcard/berlin.map") and return value is always false. (of course File path is correct and i created mapsforge-map-0.3.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar) I have attached screenshots. Why that? Thanks so much !!
Attachment: Unsupport File version 2.png
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=255

item.contents:
From dientran...@gmail.com on February 20, 2012 20:21:22
thanks so much ! AVM r1826 project was run! Now I try creat a .map file by : follow the instructions https://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/wiki/MapFileWriterOsmosis (created .map file version 2 successful). I replaced mapsforge-mapfile-writer-x.x.x.jar by mapsforge-map-writer-0.3.0-SNAPSHOT.jar in directory "/home/prometheus/.openstreetmap/osmosis/plugins/" to create .map file version 3 but error. I have attached screenshots. Why that? Thanks so much !!
Attachment: screen1.png screen2.png

From dientran...@gmail.com on February 22, 2012 09:42:18
I build the map-file-writer.jar on win7. After, i copy .jar file to ubuntu 10.04. Is that cause? You say "The maven build also produces a jar file that includes all dependencies, so no need to install trove." but when I copy trove file to osmosis is still error but error is difference with no copy trove file? Above is my two questions. And now, I am try build the map-file-writer.jar on ubuntu 10.04.

From dientran...@gmail.com on February 24, 2012 18:51:56
I build the map-file-writer.jar successfully on ubuntu 10.04. :) But when i did it, had some proplems that was not clearly GettingStartedDevelopers wiki page. I want to contribute for other members can build the map-file-writer.jar easier :) How do i ?
